message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $10000 by its current owner. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you with an offer of $9500. This is a special price tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for high-quality items. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
